name: Truth-Tellers and Liars
description:
It is a game project for York University DATT 2300. Basically, It is a logic game. You need to find the truth among lies.

Good Luck!

Logic questions are retrieved from https://brilliant.org/wiki/truth-tellers-and-liars/

Music:  Village Dreaming by Visager https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Visager
